page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content: { Eastern Counties Buses}provide local services.The children from Frettenham and Hainford come to school on a bus,an Eastern Counties bus from Frettenham,a school bus from Hainford.The secondary school children travel to Norwich on private coaches hired by the Education Authority. Most children have a{bicycle}and some young people have motor{cycles}or {mopeds. We found out that many people in the area work in Norwich and they travel to work by{car.}The teachers at our school come in cars only one uses the bus.
